thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Hotel, Close to everything
thread.title_full: Great Hotel, Close to everything - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Erick G
title: Great Hotel, Close to everything
text:
We booked this hotel through our wonderful travel agent, Becky, at Beach Bum Vacations. She found it on pretty short notice after the other hotel we had booked raised their prices. The hotel was very modern, with great decor. The breakfast buffet had a huge variety of fresh pastries and fruit. The hotel itself is within walking distance from all of the major sites and attractions, and there are a few excellent restaurants on the same street. The staff was very helpful and was even able to get us into a New Years eve dinner at a restaurant that we were told was overbooked!
We definitely recommend this hotel to anyone making a trip to Rome!
